TopicTitle: Stuck with the above posters avatar (Redux)

Articles.Content: I reincarnate at the next floor, where somebody was practicing voodoo magic. When the elevator doors open, I start looking for Bigcheecho, he will taste my laser gun. I see the vending machine and do a canadian bro fist.

50. I press the floor 52. Smells like burn'd flesh, nothing a cardboard box and a tranquilizer gun can't handle.

(http://www.blogcdn.com/www.joystiq.com/media/2008/11/cardboard_534534534.jpg)

50. I press the floor 52. Smells like burn'd flesh, nothing a cardboard box and a tranquilizer gun can't handle.

(http://www.blogcdn.com/www.joystiq.com/media/2008/11/cardboard_534534534.jpg)

Notice the human.

Try my best to hold in my solar flares for now.

Try not to go supernova in the elevator.

(my avatar is a picture of a giant star about to die)

52. applying some badass looking sunscrean before stepping off.

(http://bbsimg.ngfiles.com/1/23626000/ngbbs4f07b6feec98e.jpg)

[Floor 53]

Well, I'll tell you this: elevators do not like several tons of weight in them... and it was a pretty tight fit.
54. Ahhhh DRAGON! Throw fire at it!

[Floor 55]

*Doors open, about to step in*

"What the- How do you even fit in there?" *Gets hit with fire* "Is there a draft in here?"
Lemme just barge in here.....I see a tiny black dot resembling a skyscraper......*grabs microscope* Oh, i just crushed a dragon!
Floor 56 I am pretty cramped here with a planet. Not much to talk about except gravity (the movie? the force? Up to you).
57. A tiny tiger on a wagon awaits me. I have no idea what's going on.

Floor 58...

Ooof. Will someone get this gorram train engine off me?

Floor 59.

I don't think Destiny can fit in here. Huh. I stand corrected. This elevator is either the tardis, or I am drunk.

floor60

seeing a rocket fly at them scares some people for a moment....

well, it really is an amazing experience having to fly a rocket around Kerbin with only a few cm of space to maneuver in, I set myself in a stable orbit, hoping that the kraken won't attack me

floor 61

ok there is a rocket here but that isn't anything new for me me anyone...

just don't attract the Kraken please

Floor 62

I step in and notice an astronaut. I wonder why he wears a space suit in an elevator and smiled lightly at him awkwardly.

Floor 63

I float there, not doing anything except looking ominous and kinda cool and glowy.

floor 64

i stair at the floating thing while walking in with dramatic music playing

Floor 65

I said hi timidly as I walk in the elevator. I then made a bubble with my chewing gum in my mouth.
A man with no avatar walks in on floor 66. He then proceeds to light everyone on fire.
An invisible man touches bumps into me on floor 67. I use my magic and turn myself invisible as well.
A robot wolf with one of those grabbing things used to grab asteroids in KSP on the end of its tail walks in and attempts to kill everyone with a chainsaw on floor 68
I walk in on what should be floor #72 and observe said robot wolf and smile at how far my elevator has come.
ok i walk in on to floor 73 and just look at the weird green guy with a backpack ( i am not sure what your avatar is) and just wait while my pack takes up room in the elevator.
I try to shove myself into the elevator after it's arrived on floor 74 because the same astronaut's pack is taking too much space.
Even without an astronaut taking up space, I can hardly fit in the elevator. I can't be sure, but I think I just sat on someone...
